edge: Chhichhore is a movie inspired by writer-director Nitesh Tiwari's own experiences of college life at the Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay, which is depicted in the film as 'National College of Technology'
Aniruddha Pathak, the protagonist of Chhichhore, is loosely inspired by writer-director Nitesh Tiwari's own experiences in college
Some of the scenes in Chhichhore were incorporated from the lives of co-writers Piyush Gupta and Nikhil Mehrotra
Piyush Gupta and Nikhil Mehrotra, co-writers of Chhichhore, worked under Nitesh Tiwari at Leo Burnett
Abhishek Joseph George replaced Shane Nigam as the actor playing the role of a Malayali student due to scheduling conflicts
The theme song of Chhichhore was shot at a cost of ₹9 crores (₹90 million)
The theme song of Chhichhore was shot with the reunion of choreographers Bosco-Caesar after three years
Major portions of Chhichhore were shot at IIT Bombay
